definition: poor/destitute/to use up/to exhaust/thoroughly/extremely/(coll.) persistently and pointlessly
sour/tart/sick at heart/grieved/sore/aching/pedantic/impractical/to make sarcastic remarks about sb/an acid
each other/one another/mutually/fret on the neck of a pipa 琵琶[pi2 pa5] (a fret on the soundboard is called a 品[pin3])
appearance/portrait/picture/government minister/(physics) phase/(literary) to appraise (esp. by scrutinizing physical features)/to read sb's fortune (by physiognomy, palmistry etc)
country bumpkin/boor/unsophisticated country person (humble, applied to oneself)/burial mound
lit. a vile character flourishes (idiom)/fig. an inferior person gets into a position of power, becoming conceited and arrogant
to think of oneself as high and pure (idiom); smug and self-righteous/holier-than-thou
(Wu dialect) bum/wretched-looking tramp who lives by begging or stealing
to make a show of being decent and proper/to display phony or hypocritical behavior
